LanguageData.ATR_Install_PlasteelPlating.label: Install Plasteel Plating
LanguageData.ATR_Install_PlasteelPlating.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a tempered plasteel-infused frame, enhancing combat survivability.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_GuardianFrame.label: Install Guardian Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_GuardianFrame.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a guardian frame, greatly enhancing environmental survivability and police capabilities.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_HydraulicFrame.label: Install Hydraulic Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_HydraulicFrame.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a hydraulic frame, greatly enhancing weight capacity and general labor efficiency.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SuppressorFrame.label: Install Suppressor Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SuppressorFrame.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a suppressor frame, greatly reducing the combat threat of this unit.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_CompositePlating.label: Install Composite Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_CompositePlating.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a mechanite-plasteel composite frame, greatly enhancing combat survivability.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_RefinedFrame.label: Install Refined Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_RefinedFrame.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a refined frame, accentuating sociability and imbuing a distinctly noble and striking look. Installing the frame is as much up to the components as to the artistic skills of its installer, as there is no way to standardize the beauty of the intricate design.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SanitaryFrame.label: Install Sanitary Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SanitaryFrame.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a sanitary frame, ensuring it is completely free of filth and completely sanitized.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_MobilityFrame.label: Install Mobility Frame
LanguageData.ATR_Install_MobilityFrame.description: Replaces the chassis frame of this unit with a mobility frame, greatly enhancing its movement capabilities and agility.
